      • placeShip

        public boolean placeShip(java.lang.String name,
                int[] x,
                int[] y)
        Called by the GUI when a ship has been placed on the battlefield.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ship
        x - An array with all x-coordinates
        y - An array with all y-coordinates
        Returns:
        true if the placement is valid, false otherwise
